00084 #include <stdio.h>
00085 #include "mscb.h"

00087 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00088 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00089 
00090 char code node_name[] = "SCS-500";
00091 
00092 sbit SR_CLOCK = P0 ^ 4;         // Shift register clock
00093 sbit SR_STROBE = P0 ^ 5;        // Storage register clock
00094 sbit SR_DATA = P0 ^ 6;          // Serial data
00095 
00096 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00097 
00098 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00099 
00100 struct {
00101    float adc[8];
00102    float dac0, dac1;
00103    unsigned char p1;
00104    unsigned char adc_average;
00105    unsigned char gain[8];       // PGA bits
00106    float gain_cal;              // gain calibration
00107    float bip_cal;               // bipolar zero offset
00108 } idata user_data;
00109 
00110 /* Usage of gain:
00111 
00112  Bipol.     Ext.  PGA          Int. PGA       Gain
00113 
00114   Bit5      Bit4 Bit3       Bit2 Bit1 Bit0
00115    0         0    0          0    0    0       1
00116    0         0    0          0    0    1       2
00117    0         0    0          0    1    0       4
00118    0         0    0          0    1    1       8
00119    0         0    0          1    0    0      16
00120    0         0    0          1    1    0       0.5
00121 
00122    0         0    1          0    0    0      10
00123    0         1    0          0    0    0     100
00124    0         1    1          0    0    0    1000
00125 
00126    1  bipolar, represents external jumper setting
00127 */
00128 
00129 
00130 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00131    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC0", &user_data.adc[0],
00132    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC1", &user_data.adc[1],
00133    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC2", &user_data.adc[2],
00134    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC3", &user_data.adc[3],
00135    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC4", &user_data.adc[4],
00136    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC5", &user_data.adc[5],
00137    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC6", &user_data.adc[6],
00138    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADC7", &user_data.adc[7],
00139    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "DAC0", &user_data.dac0,
00140    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "DAC1", &user_data.dac1,
00141    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "P1", &user_data.p1,
00142 
00143    1, UNIT_COUNT, 0, 0, 0, "ADCAvrg", &user_data.adc_average,
00144    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Gain0", &user_data.gain[0],
00145    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Gain1", &user_data.gain[1],
00146    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Gain2", &user_data.gain[2],
00147    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Gain3", &user_data.gain[3],

00152    4, UNIT_FACTOR, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "GainCal", &user_data.gain_cal,
00153    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "BipCal", &user_data.bip_cal,
00154    0
00155 };

00163 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00164 void write_gain(void) reentrant;

00166 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00167 
00168 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00169 
00170 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00171 {
00172    unsigned char i;
00173 
00174    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00175    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00176    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00177 
00178    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00179    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00180    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00181 
00182    // uncomment following line for P1 push-pull mode
00183    //PRT1CF = 0xFF;
00184 
00185    /* initial EEPROM value */
00186    if (init) {
00187       user_data.adc_average = 8;
00188       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00189          user_data.gain[i] = 0;
00190       user_data.gain_cal = 1;
00191       user_data.bip_cal = 0;
00192 
00193       user_data.dac0 = 0;
00194       user_data.dac1 = 0;
00195       user_data.p1 = 0xff;
00196    }
00197 
00198    if (user_data.gain_cal < 0.1 || user_data.gain_cal > 10)
00199       user_data.gain_cal = 1;
00200 
00201    if (user_data.bip_cal < -1 || user_data.bip_cal > 1)
00202       user_data.bip_cal = 0;
00203 
00204    /* write P1 and DACs */
00205    user_write(8);
00206    user_write(9);
00207    user_write(10);
00208 
00209    /* write gains */
00210    write_gain();
00211 
00212    // DEBUG_MODE = 1;
00213 }
00214 
00215 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00216 
00217 #pragma NOAREGS
00218 
00219 void write_gain(void) reentrant
00220 {
00221    unsigned char i;
00222 
00223    SR_STROBE = 0;
00224    SR_CLOCK = 0;
00225 
00226    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00227       SR_DATA = ((user_data.gain[3 - i] & 0x02) > 0);   // first bit ext. PGA
00228       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00229       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00230 
00231       SR_DATA = ((user_data.gain[3 - i] & 0x01) > 0);   // second bit ext. PGA
00232       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00233       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00234    }
00235 
00236    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00237       SR_DATA = ((user_data.gain[7 - i] & 0x02) > 0);   // first bit ext. PGA
00238       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00239       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00240 
00241       SR_DATA = ((user_data.gain[7 - i] & 0x01) > 0);   // second bit ext. PGA
00242       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00243       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00244    }
00245 
00246    SR_DATA = 0;
00247    SR_STROBE = 1;
00248    SR_STROBE = 0;
00249 }
00250 
00251 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00252 {
00253    unsigned short d;
00254 
00255    switch (index) {
00256    case 8:                     // DAC0
00257       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00258       d = ((user_data.dac0 + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00259       if (d >= 0x1000)
00260          d = 0x0FFF;
00261 
00262 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00263       DAC0H = d >> 8;
00264       DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00265 #endif
00266 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00267       DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00268       DAC0H = d >> 8;
00269 #endif
00270       break;
00271 
00272    case 9:                     // DAC1
00273       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00274       d = ((user_data.dac1 + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00275       if (d >= 0x1000)
00276          d = 0x0FFF;
00277 
00278 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00279       DAC1H = d >> 8;
00280       DAC1L = d & 0xFF;
00281 #endif
00282 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00283       DAC1L = d & 0xFF;
00284       DAC1H = d >> 8;
00285 #endif
00286       break;
00287 
00288    case 10:                    // p1 
00289       P1 = user_data.p1;
00290       break;
00291 
00292    case 11:                    // adc_average
00293       if (user_data.adc_average > 8)
00294          user_data.adc_average = 8;
00295       break;
00296    }
00297 
00298    if (index > 10)
00299       write_gain();
00300 }
00301 
00302 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00303 
00304 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00305 {
00306    if (index == 10)
00307       user_data.p1 = P1;
00308 
00309    return 0;
00310 }
00311 
00312 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00313 
00314 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00315 {
00316    /* echo input data */
00317    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00318    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00319    return 2;
00320 }
00321 
00322 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00323 
00324 void adc_read(channel, float *d)
00325 {
00326    unsigned long value;
00327    unsigned int i, n;
00328    float gvalue;
00329 
00330    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00331    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00332 
00333    n = 1 << (user_data.adc_average + 4);
00334 
00335    value = 0;
00336    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00337       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00338 
00339       ADCINT = 0;
00340       ADBUSY = 1;
00341       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00342 
00343       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00344 
00345       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00346       yield();
00347    }
00348 
00349    if (user_data.adc_average)
00350       value >>= (user_data.adc_average);
00351 
00352    /* convert to volts */
00353    gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 2.5;
00354 
00355    /* subtract 1V for bipolar mode */
00356    if (user_data.gain[channel] & 0x04)
00357       gvalue = gvalue - 1;
00358 
00359    /* external voltage divider */
00360    gvalue *= 10 * user_data.gain_cal;
00361 
00362    /* correct for bipolar offset */
00363    if (user_data.gain[channel] & 0x04)
00364       gvalue += user_data.bip_cal;
00365 
00366    /* external PGA */
00367    switch (user_data.gain[channel] & 0x03) {
00368    case 0x00:
00369       gvalue /= 1.0;
00370       break;
00371    case 0x01:
00372       gvalue /= 10.0;
00373       break;
00374    case 0x02:
00375       gvalue /= 100.0;
00376       break;
00377    case 0x03:
00378       gvalue /= 1000.0;
00379       break;
00380    }
00381 
00382    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00383    *d = gvalue;
00384    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00385 }
00386 
00387 void user_loop(void)
00388 {
00389    static unsigned char i = 0;
00390 
00391    adc_read(i, &user_data.adc[i]);
00392    i = (i + 1) % 8;
00393 }
